body_html: On a second thought, the Gamma is a generalization of the Erlang, where instead of using the factorial it uses the Gamma function. The only advantage of adding the Erlang is to constrain the scale parameter to just integers and optimize the kernel to just compute the factorial instead of the gamma function.

The only advantage of adding the Erlang is to constrain the scale parameter to just integers and optimize the kernel to just compute the factorial instead of the gamma function.
body: On a second thought, the Gamma is a generalization of the Erlang, where instead of using the factorial it uses the Gamma function. The only advantage of adding the Erlang is to constrain the scale parameter to just integers and optimize the kernel to just compute the factorial instead of the gamma function.
